devdoc.details: Decided not to keep an array of members and use this array to automatically set the members balance in a mapping, since we allow members to renounce from the team. This contract follows the "withdraw pattern". This means that payments are not automatically forwarded to the accounts but kept in this contract, and the actual transfer is triggered as a separate step by calling the {withdraw} function.

splitPrize().details: Implements the "withdraw pattern" by allocating balances to team  members, so they can request a withdraw later.

withdraw(uint256).details: Implements the "withdraw pattern" allowing members to withdraw funds. Note The method is public, so inactive members (that renounced membership) are still able to withdraw funds in case balance > 0.

splitPrize().notice: Splits the available's contract balance between active team members.

withdraw(uint256).notice: Allows a team member to withdraw its funds from the contract.
